listitem.para: To report bugs for a product component, or to submit enhancement requests, use . For documentation bugs, submit a bug report for the component Documentation of the respective product.
If you are new to Bugzilla, you might find the following articles helpful:
For services and support options available for your product, refer to .

We want to hear your comments about and suggestions for this manual and the other documentation included with this product. If you are reading the HTML version of this guide, use the Comments feature at the bottom of each page in the online documentation at .
If you are reading the single-page HTML version of this guide, you can use the Report Bug link next to each section to open a bug report at . A user account is needed for this.

For feedback on the documentation of this product, you can also send a mail to doc-team@suse.com. Make sure to include the document title, the product version, and the publication date of the documentation. To report errors or suggest enhancements, provide a concise description of the problem and refer to the respective section number and page (or URL).
